content:encoded:
Topics: Adult Children, Siblings, Mother Issues, Secrets, Same-Sex Attraction, Estrangement
Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Dr. Alice Benton, Chris Williams

Caller Questions:

  1. How do I address my older child being very upset that my 22yo child is living at home and going to college but not working? 
  2. How do I move forward if my mom doesn’t want me to tell my older siblings that I have a different father? 
  3. My lesbian daughter has a partner and has been estranged from me for 3yrs. How do I restore the relationship? 

Suggested Resources:
Doing Life with Your Adult Children
Take Your Life Back
Forgiving Our Fathers and Mothers
How We Love

Subscribe to the NEW LIFE LIVE! podcast via iTunes or download the New Life Ministries App.
